TopicTitle: Well I got inspiration from KSP to make a space game.

Articles.Content:
I have spare time now.

So I\'m making an XNA 2d collision of Minecraft and KSP...

One problem, I can\'t think of a title without it breaking Squads copyrights...

Any suggestions on a name?

(I will probably turn to 3d in beta...)
Ooh, Ooh! Make the Mun and mine its resources!
What game-,- how can we give it a name without we didn\'t play the game itself. Or pics? vid?
I feel that this project should be what Kerbal Space Program was meant to be - a 2d space sim set in a 3d world.

What game-,- how can we give it a name without we didn\'t play the game itself. Or pics? vid?

I don\'t have a build yet.

Omicrix.

That\'s a name I\'m going to consider...

Ooh, Ooh! Make the Mun and mine its resources!

I will start like KSP basically, I will have a select group use the Pre-Alpha builds...

I\'ll start on some planet I\'m going to name...

Then work my way up to the Mun and multiple other planets...

Email me if you would like to be in the group.

(Make the subject your username from KSP..)

I feel that this project should be what Kerbal Space Program was meant to be - a 2d space sim set in a 3d world.

I\'m going to make 3D in beta or late alpha...

I currently need to learn how to create a Unity 3D game.

I\'m going to make 3D in beta or late alpha...

I currently need to learn how to create a Unity 3D game.

I feel that - with 3d controls - it\'d be too much like KSP.

I feel that - with 3d controls - it\'d be too much like KSP.

It\'s not really like KSP...

There will be building stuff on other planets(I might make it so you can launch another artificial moon into orbit...

The only thing I am very un sure about is if I\'m going to use the planet names in real life....
